title: Local Temperature Companion App
description: A simple app that visualizes data received wirelessly from the Local Temperature node.js/IoT project when running on a IoT platform such as a development board with a Temperature Sensor connected. The complimentary Node.js IoT project is visible under Internet of Things (IoT) with Node.js Projects: Start with a Sample or Template.
tooltip: A simple app that visualizes data received wirelessly from the Local Temperature node.js/IoT project when running on a IoT platform such as a development board with a Temperature Sensor connected.
